On Fri, 10 Sep 2004 14:55:54 -0000, Anshumaan Rajshiva
<arajshiva@...> wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> I want to know a way by which i can dump useful information in a test
> case using JUNIT even if it is passing. Till now, all the assert
> statements throws message only if the statement fails. I want to know
> is there a way to dump a message even if the assert statement passes??
> 
> If there is no such provision in the assert statements then is there
> a way in JUNIT by which i can dump any output message from the test
> case??

Um, have you tried System.out.println ?
